input_text.Prompt:
Using the item specifications and item specification, write a copy that follows the AIDA framework (Attention, Interest, Desire, Action) for a product or service. The copy should be concise, catchy, and persuasive.

Item specification:
Culinary 2116 Universal Mini Microphone with Omnidirectional Stereo Mic for Phone, Singing

Item specifications:
IT CAN BE USED IN THE FOLLOWING APPLICATIONS:SMULE SING,YOUTUBE,AUDACITY,SEESAW,BOOK CREATOR,SKYPE,TIK TOK ETC
Don't need batteries, easy to carry and collect suitable for the most of cellphones
It can be compatible with multi Singing software, and lets you have a good Singing experience
Do not charge the phone when the dsc of a microphone, otherwise there will be current sound.
Perfect surface spray processing technology
Just plug and record, anytime anywhere without external power Supply.
 light weight, high quality, easy to take along
It can be compatible with multi singing software, and lets you have a good singing experience.

Product description:
input_text.Response A: Hey, I found this microphone on Amazon and thought I'd share it with you. It can be used to sing karaoke on your phone, record podcasts, use as a home studio microphone, and more. The microphone is compatible with multiple apps and comes with an omnidirectional stereo mic so that you can capture high-quality sound from any direction. The microphone is also very portable and small, so you can easily carry it around with you and use it anywhere. I think this microphone would be a great addition to your home studio, or if you just want to sing karaoke with your friends.
input_text.Response B:
Sing your heart out with this universal mic!

The Culinary 2116 Universal Mini Microphone with Omnidirectional Stereo Mic for Phone, Singing is a must-have accessory for anyone who loves to record their voice or sing. It works with most smartphones and is ideal for use with popular singing apps like Smule and YouTube. This mic is easy to use and doesn't require batteries to function. It's also light weight and easy to carry, so you can take it with you wherever you go. It comes with a clip that securely fastens to your phone, and it doesn't require any external power source. This mic is great for playing music, recording voice memos, and making videos. With this mic, you'll be able to record your voice with clear, crisp audio.

The Culinary 2116 Universal Mini Microphone with Omnidirectional Stereo Mic for Phone, Singing is compatible with many different singing and recording software platforms, including Smule, TikTok, YouTube, and Audacity. It's also compatible with many different types of smartphones, including iPhones and Android models. This mic is a great investment for anyone who enjoys making music or recording their voice. It's a versatile tool that can be used for many different purposes.

Get the Culinary 2116 Universal Mini Microphone with Omnidirectional Stereo Mic for Phone, Singing and start recording your voice today!
